title: Python Implementation and Code Development
description: Implement the complete visualization system in Python using appropriate mathematical and visualization libraries. Create modular, well-documented code that accurately renders the topology concept with interactive features.
expected_output: Complete Python implementation including: (1) Main visualization script with mathematical computations, (2) Interactive components and user controls, (3) Multiple output formats (static, animated, interactive), (4) Comprehensive code documentation and comments, (5) Example usage and parameter exploration scripts, (6) Performance optimization and error handling
